text: The Signal Tower is a 1924 American silent drama film directed by Clarence Brown and produced and distributed by Universal Pictures. The film stars Virginia Valli, Rockliffe Fellowes, and Wallace Beery.Progressive Silent Film List: The Signal Tower at silentera.comThe AFI Catalog of Feature Films: The Signal Tower ==Cast== *Virginia Valli as Sally Taylor *Rockliffe Fellowes as Dave Taylor *Frankie Darro as Sonny Taylor *Wallace Beery as Joe Standish *James O. Barrows as Old Bill *J.
